translations: n.花生，花生米；<非正式>很少的钱（peanuts）；小片聚苯乙烯泡沫塑料（peanuts）

sentences.sentence: James flicked a peanut at her.
sentences.translation: 詹姆斯朝她轻轻弹一颗花生。

sentences.sentence: I had two peanut butter and jelly sandwiches.
sentences.translation: 我吃了两个花生酱果酱三明治。

sentences.sentence: You can even get peanut butter and jelly on an English muffin for breakfast.
sentences.translation: 早餐时你甚至可以吃到英式松饼，佐以花生酱和果冻。
